Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: B. Adams
Reviews.Content: I really, really like this camera. It takes awesome photos. To be honest, at first I was disappointed. It turned out to be a lot bigger (thicker) than I expected, which was just error on my part for not clarifying dimensions. The user interface is very elementary and I felt like I didn't have a lot of control. Then, the way that the screen displays the images-it was rather mediocre. There didn't seem to be anything special (well, that is, 10.1 MP special) about them.Anyway, I decided that it was such a great deal that I could deal with these quirks. I'm so glad I decided to stick with it! Once the photos were uploaded, they looked INCREDIBLE!!! I couldn't believe that I took them (I wasn't even trying to pay attention at quality, and a lot of the pictures were taken when I wasn't actually sober...).I don't really use the Best Shots, but the camera pretty much does all the work for me. So, yeah--if you're looking for an easy, straightforward, inexpensive (you wouldn't believe how much research I did on inexpensive digital cameras.. this one is by far the best value), digital camera, this is a great choice!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: LayedBackGuy
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera, so I don't have any other to compare it to; but I have used film type off and on for many years, including some semi-pro SLR types my ex-lady owned.  Right out of the box, using quick start/dummy settings, this one took some impressive pictures!  I have yet to mess around with some of the more advanced manual and auto settings, but I can see already this camera is a great deal for the price.  Picture quality and ease of use are outstanding!  My only complaints so far; the buttons are a bit small, and I have had to back track through the menu a few times to make up for my thick fingers, and I can tell already the lens assembly is a bit delicate...watch your fingers when the camera is on!  Also, I would recommend buying a case to go with; though this is a 'stick it in your pocket' size camera, it looks like the lens and LCD screen will not hold up to that sort of treatment in the long run.Casio Exilim EX-Z29 10.1 MP Digital Camera with  3x Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Purple)

Reviews.Title: It's a camera. UPDATED AGAIN! 2/26/11
Reviews.Author: Kool Dad
Reviews.Content: Well, I my review might be a little jaded since I'm used to using DSLR cameras that produce brilliant pictures but I'll give you my opinion anyway. For $70 bucks I guess it's worth it to have a camera that you can just throw in your pocket and use for snapshots. In low light your gonna get allot of "redeye" because the flash is so close to the lens. Outside in well lit area i.e. daytime the camera works good. It's also very slow between shots (must be the processor) again I'm used to cameras that can take several shots a second.Bottom line: If you want a basic camera to take ok snapshots and you can get this camera on sale for $70.00 I'd say it's a good buy. If you want more speed and better pictures in low light look somewhere else.UPDATE: 5/28/10  My son dropped the camera into the dogs water bowl that was full. The camera was submerged for 10-20 seconds. Without turning the camera on I removed the battery and the memory card and let the camera dry for twelve hours. The camera works fine.UPDATE: 6/24/10I've owned this camera for two months now and It's just a piece of crap. Theres no better way to put it. Whites are too easily washed out. Redeye is awful, and the time it takes the camera to process the pictures in between shots is forever. Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere.UPDATE: 2/26/11The Camera has been sitting on a shelf for months now. I'll either lug my big Canon DSLR around or use the camera in my iphone 4 before I use this camera.

Reviews.Title: Casio Does Not Stand Behind Warranty
Reviews.Author: Big Mick
Reviews.Content: Please note that this review is about the product, not about Amazon's service.  As usual, their service was great.  I bought this camera for my daughter.  She used it about one month and then the flash unit quit working. I sent it to Casio for warranty repair, and their response is that they'll repair it for $69 plus $10 to ship it back to us.  That's about the same amount as the original purchase price. I won't be buying a Casio camera of any kind again.

Reviews.Title: Broken casio EXILIM
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Had the camera for about a week and the lens locked up.  Sent it back to Casio for repair.  Let you know how it goes..

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and great buy ;)
Reviews.Author: Darla
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera yesterday, and i LOVE IT! I wanted a good camera that took good pix, and took video with sound, and that's what this camera has, Got it for a really good price. Mine's purple, amazing color, love it. Long story short... GET IT! Really good buy!

Reviews.Title: Best little Point and Shoot Camera little money can buy!
Reviews.Author: trinidaddy
Reviews.Content: Bought the previous model EX-Z9 with 8.1 megapixel in a cool orange metallic housing almost two years ago on a sale for $89.--for my wife. I was a bit sceptic about the CASIO brand for a camera, a CASIO for me is a watch... As a photo enthusiast for more than 30 years I owned Olympus, Nikon, Pentax, Minolta, Canon, Sony, Kodak and even a Polaroid camera. I figured, since when I switched from using 35mm cameras to digital, the life expectance of those is an average 2 years. Because they are so handy to be always carried around you drop them, you loose them, they got pickpocket in a crowd at a concert, wet up while I'm sailing or they just die the magic electronic or fine mechanic death. The very same CASIO EX-Z9 actually only lasted for four month.... it got stolen in a break in our apartment... Ok, back to the subject, in those 4 month we had this camera it impressed me compared to it's price, with the excellent quality of the pics it took, nice zoom, powerful little flash, easy to use menus, the sturdiness of the housing made more from metal than plastic, it's small size easily fitting in a shirt pocket, it came with a rechargeable lithium ion battery and travel charger and it's cool look (it wasn't pink...). As a replacement I got for my wife last year on a Amazon Gold Box Deal for the same $89.-- a Nikon Coolpix L20, 10 megapixel, at that time I couldn't find a CASIO in that price class and the Nikon was rated in more than a 100 reviews with an average 4 stars. It turned to be out bigger and heavier than the CASIO, didn't came with rechargeable batteries, has an all plastic housing and I noticed the picture output on crisp shots, specially with flash use was far higher with the CASIO in auto mode than with the Nikon.I myself own a bigger and more professional Canon PowerShot G10 and now put the Amazon Gold Box offer for $69.-- for the CASIO EX-Z29 despite it's pink in my shopping basket, so I have a nice little camera to carry around all the time...... just will have to hide it away from my wife....!

Reviews.Title: For the kids, maybe.  For yourself, pick something else.
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: I bought this on sale from Amazon because it was cheap, and the reviews were good.  After using it for two months, I have to say that I'm disappointed with the pictures.  Colors just aren't vibrant, nor are they particularly accurate.  The time between red-eye flash and real flash is way too long, and it's so bright that most subjects think it's the main flash and move before the picture snaps.  I've had to retake so many pictures because of this.  Videos are poor quality, very grainy and low frame rate.  Like other cameras in its class, the battery has to be charged in a separate charger instead of simply plugging a power cord into the camera.On the plus side, it's easy to use.  It has the usual presets which can be selected by scrolling through sample scenes.  You just pick the scene that's similar to the one you're taking.I also have a Fuji Finepix J20 for comparison.  Picture and video quality of the Exilim is markedly inferior to the Fuji.  Although the Exilim is $50 cheaper, the savings isn't worth it.  I'm giving this to the kids.

Reviews.Title: Good, but not perfect
Reviews.Author: Antoni E. Walker
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend, and the only thing she disliked was the screen quality on the back. It is very pixelated, and definately could have been better. It is a very big screen, but its quality is comparable to the screens on some of the very first digital cammeras. The screen is sufficient though as it does not affect much as it just looks bad. the camera seems easy to use, and has tons of features. Also the picture quality is amazing. Overall a very great buy. I bought this as the deal of the day, so the price was about $70, so for this price it was definately worth the money. The camera is well built, and looks pretty cool.

Reviews.Title: Terrible service
Reviews.Author: Ken Crocker "Drawing Student"
Reviews.Content: I bought a Casio exilim camera in April and after two months, the lens refused to contract all the way. I sent the camera to repair and they sent me a used camera in return. This camera broke almost immediately. Again I sent the camera in for repair. They refused to give me a new camera, and after a month I am still waiting for another replacement used camera. I have been without a camera for two months now.

Reviews.Title: Not Terribly Impressed.
Reviews.Author: G. Hubley
Reviews.Content: I got this camera about a year ago, and I was excited, because my mom had told me that she'd ordered me a purple camera. Please. this isn't purple. But I'm not gonna moan about the color. I've never liked the quality of the pictures it takes. they're just not good compared to some other cameras you could get. Also, if a room is at all dark and you're trying to take pictures you can't. it tells you it's underexposed. but if you put on the flash, the picture if either overexposed or just fake looking. I admit that i like to take quality pictures, and this is definitely not the camera for it. for just taking pictures of friends, sure, it'll pass. as long as you don't want action picture. this camera can not handle that. so, yeah. i'm not terribly impressed with this camera, and i'm looking for a better one. don't waste your money if you're expecting good pictures from this camera. you won't get them.

Reviews.Title: My Casio
Reviews.Author: Jaiwillde
Reviews.Content: This is actually my first digital camera and it is just perfect for me! It doesn't have a lot of difficult buttons to figure out which is great if you like things to be simple. The pictures turn out clear and full of color. I am really enjoying my casio!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: D. Flanders "Grady55"
Reviews.Content: I had a fairly expensive Pentax digital camera that had so many bells and whistles on it that I had no idea how to use, and I usually ended up screwing it up. It was an OK camera but a waste on a point-and-shooter like me. So my friend had this camera and I was very impressed by the pictures it took. I looked around, and Amazon had the best price I could find for it. Well, out of the box I was taking pictures with it, did a couple little videos, this a much easier camera to use. I like the size too, it's small and light.Bonus:  It's FUSCIA (not purple) so my husband won't want to borrow it. I'm giving him the Pentax.

Reviews.Title: Good for the Price
Reviews.Author: G. Faugier
Reviews.Content: For the price of about $80 something dollars, it was pretty good.  It does its job by taking pictures.  The seller shipped it to me fairly quickly.With this camera, beware that the image quality on the video is grainy when you zoom.  Otherwise, video quality is average.  If you take a picture without flash in a dark area, the picture will come out blurry.Basically, u get what you pay for and for the price I paid, it was worth it.

Reviews.Title: Sleek, compact, durable and convenient
Reviews.Author: jacquelinemary
Reviews.Content: I have taken over 100 pics so far with this new camera and havent run into a single issue.Zoom is good, quick pic taking is good, i like the confirmation beep, love the large screen, scrolling review is a breeze.All good, I would recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: Eric Costello
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It's a great value, being only ninety-five dollars. The menu is fairly easy to figure out, and the fact that there aren't too many buttons makes it simple to use. I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera! Superb Features! Anyone can use it.
Reviews.Author: Paul In Elgin "Paul"
Reviews.Content: This is the best, easiest to use, fully featured camera I have ever owned. Super value. I would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: If it ain't broke, don't fix it
Reviews.Author: Jane Austen "Gladys"
Reviews.Content: I have owned 4 of these Exilim cameras. The first 2 were great with the exception that sometimes the lens froze up. Easily remedied however just by powering back on and then off. They take pretty excellent pictures, even after having been dropped on concrete from belt level several times by both myself and friends who borrowed them. They are tough. I find with this one, however, that pictures are very often out of focus. I have not had that problem in the past. Oh, once in a while something would be out of focus, but not as frequently as with this one. I bought this camera for a graduation gift. It will do. However, the very first two of these {7MP and 8MP} I had were equipped with a feature that allowed it to stay on the scene mode you had chosen when you last powered it off. With these newer cameras they "fixed" that so that now, each time you power the camera on you have to remember to switch the scene mode or you will get lousy pictures. I gave it 4 stars compared to older versions of Exilim, not because of any real deficit in this version. It wasn't broke....why did they see fit to fix it? Give me my old Exilim back!

Reviews.Title: Not bad at all !!!
Reviews.Author: M. Coronado "MSC"
Reviews.Content: At first I was a little doubtful about purchasing this camera, being that I was purchasing it as a gift for someone that does not know about cameras at all.  When I received it and tested it out, I was amazed on how easy it was to work with it.  I did not have to tell this person how to use it more than once, and that in it self was awesome!! She enjoys this camera and she is using it all of the time.  The picture quality is good as well.  Good camera for what I purchased it for.!!!

Reviews.Title: It's PINK!
Reviews.Author: B. Hilson "BMH"
Reviews.Content: The camera is nice, and for the most part takes good pictures, but I have noticed at times that indoor pictures turn out grainy. I have adjusted the settings, and this seems to help, but it could be more user friendly. This camera replaced a Nikon point and shoot which always had great quality with little effort so it may be my own personal bias. It will take some getting use to but for the price it is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: robertB
Reviews.Content: i got this camera at a deep discount so everything is WAY better for the price i paid.  would i buy it a full price? probably not (but i never buy cameras at full price, so there you go).  but for an inexpensive camera with 10 mp's and GREAT battery life and about every feature you could possibly want i'd definitely make the same purchase again if i could do it all over again (well, i'd get a color other than hot pink maybe).  it's not perfect, but i love it.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Katilynn Willis
Reviews.Content: I thought this was a good camera. It was easy to operate, and the pictures came out great. I am not sure if it is my battery but mine doesn't seem to last as long as I would like. Its light and not too bulky easy to carry. I was impressed to see the easy mode setting on the camera which makes it even easier, for younger children. I do feel like the flash could have been a little stronger but that was fixed with increasing the  flash in the settings. over all great camera and worth the money

Reviews.Title: My first one
Reviews.Author: Hector Roman "Hector J"
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera and I love it. Easy to use and very good quality pictures. I was always reluctant to replace my old SLR camera with a compact digital camera and bought this one because it had a big discount and planned to resell it later. Instead, I will keep it.Edit july 2At first, I was impressed, especially after I won a contest with an awesome picture of my girlfriend. After a while and several tries I found out that it was a matter of luck.Pros:1) Easy to use.2) Low price.3) Compact.4) Good quality if you meet the following conditions: Still subject, short distance, not shaking hands, good external light (not flash).Cons:1) Slow shutter speed, especially if there are low light conditions or if the subject is far away from the camera.2) Slow image processing time.3) Low quality for sport/action/moving pictures.4) Red eyes.5) Almost impossible to get focused images in low light conditions.

Reviews.Title: the best shop ever
Reviews.Author: ginger
Reviews.Content: esta es la mejor invertion hecho nunca , es una gran cámara , gran resolución y Funciones excelente. Se lo recomiendo .

Reviews.Title: good camera for the price I paid - WAIT - read the UPDATE!
Reviews.Author: Dr. Mike
Reviews.Content: This camera is good.  It is easy to use.  The picture quality is excellent.  The only problem is that it does not take batteries, so you have to make sure you charge it up everytime you plan to go somewhere.  It's not like you can pack a couple extra double A batteries in your pocket just in case.  When the battery runs out, you're cooked usless you can get to a computer or electrical outlet to charge her back up.WAIT A MINUTE - just when I thought it was safe to put up a positive review...now the battery has decided that it can recharge in about 4 minutes, but then when you go to use it, you can only take about 5 pics before it runs out. So, left it charging for a couple hours, but then used it for 5 minutes and guess what?  ran out in 5 mins again.  Basically the camera is useless now and I wish I had my money back.

Reviews.Title: it's very great product well worth the money for what you get for such a little device !!!
Reviews.Author: yousef
Reviews.Content: i have owned the Casio Exilim Z27 digital Camera before from Amazon. i ordered it i love it the quality was great for the price i got it for. it's great and it works fine. I now own the Casio Exilim Z29 digital camera i have had it for two years now and it works great and is awesome. I had to give up 2 mega pixels but it still does what i need it to do. It's not as great of battery life compared to the Casio Z27 also less modes and features but it gets me by for the price. I wish it had more mega pixels. I can't complain it works great. I do recommend it you guys should buy it if your looking for an affordable simple camera and video recorder that's going to get the job done. If your looking for something really professional i do not suggest it. I suggest you get a nikon or some other digital camera if your looking to do serious work with it and are prefering lots of features and different modes. Overall it's a very great camera. I must say i got what i expected and am truly satisfied. i always shop with amazon and never am disappointed. i get the price i expect and get what i paid for. Remember to read reviews and do your research before purchasing products ladies and gentlemen.

Reviews.Title: broken
Reviews.Author: blue
Reviews.Content: Used this camera fine for almost 2 years, then out of nowhere, it didn't work.  Can't get it to open the lens, can't get it to do anything but give me a white screen.  It will cost more to repair it than I paid for it, so I guess I'm out of luck.If I would have known it was only going to last 2 yrs, I would have put the money toward a better camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: joyjoy
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera this is my first digital camera. I have had it for over a year, dropped it several times and it is still going strong! The zoom on this is amazing and it takes great pictures that are of very good quality. I would suggest this camera for any one on a budget and looking for a great quality camera! It even take nice little videos! It has a lot of memory and if you buy a memory card it hold even more. To upload the videos and pictures just plug it into your computer and bam you got photos.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT PURCHASE CASIO CAMERA'S
Reviews.Author: YogaGirl
Reviews.Content: Do not buy a Casio camera! I bought one in May 14, 2010. It broke in Sept 2011. I barely used it. The warranty is only 1 yr. The company wanted me to pay $99 to have it fixed. I only paid $69 for the camera. Casio offered to sell me a new camera for $79. Do they really think I want to I want to buy their product again!!!! It only lasted 1 year and 5 months!

Reviews.Title: Love this little camera
Reviews.Author: quilt maker
Reviews.Content: I take the worst picture in the world. BUT... with this little camera they are looking so MUCH better.  If you are like me and need a camera for dummies - then this may be the one for you. VERY easy to use.  Your pictures will come out great!

Reviews.Title: Really disappointed.
Reviews.Author: M. Kirk
Reviews.Content: I have had this for close to a year ... I had an Elixim previously that I loved but this one has had problems from the start.  The back screen will sometimes stay "white" ... can't see anything.  So I turn it on and off until it appears ... it is a drag when you want that special shot!  I've put up with it ... I love the colour :) ... and hoped it would correct with time.Today I was at a special function and wanted a picture of the guest speaker and me and the camera would not focus ... completely bleared.  Eventually, it was okay ... but I had someone else take that picture with their camera.  I deleted the picture in question ... hindsight I should have saved it to post for you.  The back screen just started pulling the "white" screen again too last weekend when we were at a tulip festival ... couldn't get a shot with my Elixim!  I wasn't very happy.I wish I'd sent this back at the beginning ... I know it is too late now, but I wanted to have my review show that this isn't a good camera!  My sister bought a new Elixim ... different model and had to take it back to Future Shop for pretty much the same reason.  She ended up with a Sony instead.  Too bad ... I definitely will re-think my choice of camera after this.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Janet L. Smith
Reviews.Content: You can't pass up a camera like this for this price! I bought this for my daughter and she really loves it. The color is just what she wanted and the screen is very big. I ordered this 3 days ago and just got it today- very fast shipping! The seller sent the camera in exellent conditon, it was all wrapped up very carefully and everything was included. I approve very much! It's such a great looking camera and my daughter and I are very happy with it(:

Reviews.Title: Lens and Shuts Down
Reviews.Author: lilpam
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera from Target. It was my first digital camera. When I first received it, the lens would extend an turn off. It would be many of times when I would have to take battery out and put it back in for it to work properly. This has been going on for a while. The night pictures were bad. I loved the video content though. I've had it since late November and it;s only September 2010, not even a year old! The lens is broke, and NO I didn't break it! So buyers, please be ware. Don't get to caught up in the pretty color.

Reviews.Title: Best with this price (Murat Ozmen)
Reviews.Author: MURAT VZMEN
Reviews.Content: I bougt it for my doughter as birthday gift. She is in 8 years. I reviewed this product but it is very early to say something for every features. In my first opinion, It has many scenes named as "Best Shut". User interface is very simple. I couldn't print any photo before my review. The battery life is good. As a result, the quality is very good in this price.

Reviews.Title: perfect!`
Reviews.Author: Paula Aquino "gift lover"
Reviews.Content: I saw this on tv as a deal of the day,so i looked,i am very pleased,i have had other cameras but this one meets just as said.

Reviews.Title: Casio Exilim EX-Z29 10.1 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Purple)
Reviews.Author: Magaly Colon
Reviews.Content: excellent product. is very satisfied. is a very nice camera and came with accessories I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: my momma loves it
Reviews.Author: Kevin G. Kelley "someguy"
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera.  The 10.2MP means absolutely nothing though.  Has many features but not the pictire quality I expected

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Latte ma "Latte ma"
Reviews.Content: My computer coach recommended this camera as she had one.  Quite allot for the price.  I love it.  Only problem was it took a long time to get.  But once I contacted seller, it was send out overnight.Not allot of instructions came with camera once you get photos transferred to computer.  No software came with it except one to transfer photos off the computer, unlike my previos camera.  But my computer coach taught me how to Email photos, etc.  I highly recommend this camera and its a great price too.

Reviews.Title: Dont waste your money.
Reviews.Author: Corina
Reviews.Content: Within 2 days of my camera arriving, I got a lens error. Im sending it in for repair, what a waste.

Reviews.Title: Useless...for me.
Reviews.Author: Jonty "Jonty"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I needed to take a series of pictures of myself (In other words, I don't have anyone to stand behind the camera and press the button.)I chose this one because it specifically listed a continuous shot mode in the features.When I took it out of the box, I discovered two things:1) The "continuous shot" only works when someone is holding down the button! (I briefly considered buying a clamp.)2) There is no way to monitor the camera on my computer, which meant that even if #1 wasn't true, I would have to guess where I was in the frame.I took it back to the store where I bought it (which, for some reason, only offered it in an embarrassing shade of magenta.)I have no problem with the quality of the pictures, but surely I'm not the only person out there who wants to take pictures of themselves! It has a youtube video feature, but this is also useless to me without being able to monitor myself.I know enough about technology to know it couldn't possibly increase the cost of this product much to put basic, no-brainer features that allow you to control your camera from your computer.A shame.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.1-megapixel resolution for high-quality prints
3x optical zoom; 2.7-inch LCD screen
YouTube Capture Mode
Face Detection; Best Shot Mode
17.8 MB built-in flash memory; compatible with SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Casio Exilim EX-Z29 10.1 MP Digital Camera with  3x Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Purple)
